name: fetch_manga
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mangaverse_api.
Tool description: Unleash the World of Manga with MangaVerse API!  Discover a captivating universe of manga from Japan, Korea, and China, all conveniently translated into English. 
API description: This will get the list of manga on this server
page should be 1 or more than 1 and the genres should be string with comma
genres ex: Harem,Fantasy

page.description: The page number to fetch, default is '1'.

genres.description: A comma-separated string of genres to filter manga by, default is 'Harem,Fantasy'.
